WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 06 January 2024
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Hambantota to Colombo via Galle in the evening or night.
Winds:
Winds will be north-easterly and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
Wind  speed  may  increase  up  to  40  kmph  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coasts  extending  from
Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar.
